column5: Hi, I am new to fishing.Â  I am looking for a location at no more than 5 hours from Toronto for a long week-end fishing, with possibility to rent a cabin and boat and maybe a fishing guide. Quebec has pourvoiries du Quebec (https://www.pourvoiries.com/) with many locations providing such services. I am wondering whether something similar exists in Ontario, Thanks Eli
Start your search with NOTO...there are literally 100's of options within 5 hours of Toronto. https://noto.ca/vacationers/
